1555410.name: SUPERZGUN
1555410.description:
SUPERZGUN is a 2D survival horror game set in a post-apocalyptic world claimed by the undead.

Shoot your way through waves of swarming zeds and upgrade your gear to outlast the Horde. Equip and buy new weapons to fight the infected. Discover and acquire powerful new tech to unlock new play-styles and strategies. Reclaim the surface and gun down some zeds.

GAMEPLAY


  • Fight the Horde: Each and every zed you encounter will try to eat you in its own way. Beware of bigger foes and their terrifying mutations
  • Addictive action gameplay as you struggle for survival in a lost earth filled with intense and unique experiences
  • Loot and Shop: Explore the world to find stronger weapons and restock along the way

KEY FEATURES


  • Unique random generated world each run
  • 50+ skills: adapt your play-style to your environment
  • Permanent death
  • 15+ weapons for a real carnage
  • Stat and highscore tracking, there can only be one #1
  • 10+ zed mutations
  • Controller support !
  • Secret bonus powerups
  • Dark and unsettling ambience
